nodes.text: "Eclipse-Maker" Garthrus was a male Nautolan member of the Twin Suns pirates living on Tatooine during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was killed at the Twin Suns Station in Jundland by a Republic citizen working for the Citizens' Militia.
"Eclipse-Maker" Garthrus appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the final boss during the staged quest "Quarry Quandary" on Tatooine.
